channel.title: Needing help with some client issues for my server willing to pay via paypal
channel.description: I have some client issues and my compiler doesent really work. I really cant be botherd now so im willing to pay if anyone can help me with a slight problem. my email is: danaye._@hotmail.com add me and chat to me, ill be willing to pay via Paypal if you help me with the problem. I need this fixed because its the only thing left needed for my friends to connect to my server, (just a local friendly server) so add me on msn :) Thanks

item.title: Needing help with some client issues for my server willing to pay via paypal
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Members on this site will help you if you just ask, a few of us only really stay on this site to help new users. Those of us willing to help will not help if you offer money though as it is agents the rules. Just post a regular help thread and someone will get to ya mate.

Read full topic
